Hello, I'm

Rohan Prajapati

Studying at Thakur College of Engineering & Technology

I aspire to become a backend developer and, in pursuit of this goal, I am also enjoying my Hobby of Graphics Designing.

My Projects

3D Modeling Project

Basic Render

This is a fundamental project in which the meshes provided by Blender were grouped together. After conducting various experiments, the image was rendered.

Liquid Battery

This was created using a cylinder as the container for the liquid, and then the liquid inside was assigned water properties to achieve a realistic appearance.

Customized Logo

This is a 3D-rendered image created from an SVG file. After applying material properties to the background and experimenting with the camera, lights, and the model, the final image was rendered.

Past Teamwork Experiences

I believe that if a person has confidence in themselves, they can achieve great heights. However, when aiming to reach a goal with a dedicated team, the sky is the limit.

Hackathon
Team: Carpe Diem

I participated in SIH 2023 as the team lead for a project focused on raising awareness about intellectual property among school students. Our team successfully cleared the department level of the internal hackathon and secured the 9th rank in the institute level competition. Although we did not progress to the finale round, the experience provided valuable insights and enhanced my leadership and teamwork skills.

Zephyr
Committee: TCET ACM

Zephyr is a college-level event where various department committees organize separate technical events, fun activities, food stalls, etc. As the Webmaster of Tcet ACM, in collaboration with TE heads and our SE technical team. The technical team oversaw events such as Coding Maniacs, Debug the Code, and an Ethical Workshop. The workshop spanned the first two days of Zephyr, while the other events continued throughout the entire duration of the event. It was a fantastic experience, and I gained valuable insights and knowledge during this period.
